column4: hi! i just upgraded to dapper from breezy but i'm still running on the 2.6.12 linux kernel instead of 2.6.15. anyone know how i can sort this out??
have you rebooted since?
hmm - odd then
is 2.6.15 in your /boot directory ?
there are some files that have 2.6.15 in them
like system.map-2.6.15
you are looking for something like vmlinuz-2.6.15-26-686
yes its there
OK grub needs a reminder I guess - try running sudo update-grub
it says no grub directory found.
hmmm
do you have a /boot/grub directory?
nope!
well, that seems to be the problem then
somehow you lost your grub dir
i dont get it. last time i upgraded the kernel i didnt have this problem
yes, it seems very odd
does it matter that my box is dual boot
you might have to reinstall grub
it might matter - do you have another linux, or windows?
i had windows initially, then i after i found out the joys of ubuntu i formatted that partition
for instance do youhave a separate /boot partition?
